the insurance policy advisory committee or I pack is currently studying this issue by looking at the impact of a hypothetical adoption of the iais is Insurance Capital standard on the US industry Marcus and consumers
the ipac is a 21-member advisory committee that was established by Congress in 2018 to advise the board on International Insurance Capital standards and other insurance issues

the group is currently performing research on the potential impact of the insurance Capital standard specifically on us life and retirement products and hopes to complete a review of this in the coming months.
